dnsServiceIP.description: An IP address assigned to the Kubernetes DNS service. It must be within the Kubernetes service address range specified in serviceCidr.

dockerBridgeCidr.description: A CIDR notation IP range assigned to the Docker bridge network. It must not overlap with any Subnet IP ranges or the Kubernetes service address range.

serviceCidr.description: A CIDR notation IP range from which to assign service cluster IPs. It must not overlap with any Subnet IP ranges.

subnetId.description: Virtual network subnet resource ID the compute nodes belong to

enableNodePublicIp.description: Enable or disable node public IP address provisioning. Possible values are: Possible values are: true - Indicates that the compute nodes will have public IPs provisioned. false - Indicates that the compute nodes will have a private endpoint and no public IPs.

propertyBag.description: A property bag containing additional properties.

remoteLoginPortPublicAccess.description: State of the public SSH port. Possible values are: Disabled - Indicates that the public ssh port is closed on all nodes of the cluster. Enabled - Indicates that the public ssh port is open on all nodes of the cluster. NotSpecified - Indicates that the public ssh port is closed on all nodes of the cluster if VNet is defined, else is open all public nodes. It can be default only during cluster creation time, after creation it will be either enabled or disabled.

subnet.description: Virtual network subnet resource ID the compute nodes belong to.

userAccountCredentials.description: Credentials for an administrator user account that will be created on each compute node.

virtualMachineImage.description: Virtual Machine image for AML Compute - windows only

resourceId.description:
Arm ResourceId is in the format "/subscriptions/{SubscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{ResourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/{StorageAccountName}"
or "/subscriptions/{SubscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{ResourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ContainerRegistry/registries/{AcrName}"

oneOf.description:
Image Classification. Multi-class image classification is used when an image is classified with only a single label
from a set of classes - e.g. each image is classified as either an image of a 'cat' or a 'dog' or a 'duck'.

limitSettings.description: [Required] Limit settings for the AutoML job.

modelSettings.description: Settings used for training the model.

primaryMetric.description: Primary metric to optimize for this task.

searchSpace.description: Search space for sampling different combinations of models and their hyperparameters.

sweepSettings.description: Model sweeping and hyperparameter sweeping related settings.

validationDataSize.description:
The fraction of training dataset that needs to be set aside for validation purpose.
Values between (0.0 , 1.0)
Applied when validation dataset is not provided.

oneOf.description:
Image Classification Multilabel. Multi-label image classification is used when an image could have one or more labels
from a set of labels - e.g. an image could be labeled with both 'cat' and 'dog'.

limitSettings.description: [Required] Limit settings for the AutoML job.

modelSettings.description: Settings used for training the model.

primaryMetric.description: Primary metric to optimize for this task.

searchSpace.description: Search space for sampling different combinations of models and their hyperparameters.

sweepSettings.description: Model sweeping and hyperparameter sweeping related settings.

validationDataSize.description:
The fraction of training dataset that needs to be set aside for validation purpose.
Values between (0.0 , 1.0)
Applied when validation dataset is not provided.

oneOf.description:
Image Instance Segmentation. Instance segmentation is used to identify objects in an image at the pixel level,
drawing a polygon around each object in the image.

limitSettings.description: [Required] Limit settings for the AutoML job.

modelSettings.description: Settings used for training the model.

primaryMetric.description: Primary metric to optimize for this task.

searchSpace.description: Search space for sampling different combinations of models and their hyperparameters.

sweepSettings.description: Model sweeping and hyperparameter sweeping related settings.

validationDataSize.description:
The fraction of training dataset that needs to be set aside for validation purpose.
Values between (0.0 , 1.0)
Applied when validation dataset is not provided.

oneOf.description:
Image Object Detection. Object detection is used to identify objects in an image and locate each object with a
bounding box e.g. locate all dogs and cats in an image and draw a bounding box around each.

codeConfiguration.description: Code configuration for the endpoint deployment.

compute.description: Compute target for batch inference operation.

environmentId.description: ARM resource ID or AssetId of the environment specification for the endpoint deployment.

environmentVariables.description: Environment variables configuration for the deployment.

errorThreshold.description:
Error threshold, if the error count for the entire input goes above this value,
the batch inference will be aborted. Range is [-1, int.MaxValue].
For FileDataset, this value is the count of file failures.
For TabularDataset, this value is the count of record failures.
If set to -1 (the lower bound), all failures during batch inference will be ignored.

loggingLevel.description: Logging level for batch inference operation.

maxConcurrencyPerInstance.description: Indicates maximum number of parallelism per instance.

miniBatchSize.description:
Size of the mini-batch passed to each batch invocation.
For FileDataset, this is the number of files per mini-batch.
For TabularDataset, this is the size of the records in bytes, per mini-batch.

model.description: Reference to the model asset for the endpoint deployment.

outputAction.description: Indicates how the output will be organized.

outputFileName.description: Customized output file name for append_row output action.

properties.description: Property dictionary. Properties can be added, but not removed or altered.

resources.description:
Indicates compute configuration for the job.
If not provided, will default to the defaults defined in ResourceConfiguration.

retrySettings.description:
Retry Settings for the batch inference operation.
If not provided, will default to the defaults defined in BatchRetrySettings.

deploymentName.description:
Name of the deployment that will be default for the endpoint.
This deployment will end up getting 100% traffic when the endpoint scoring URL is invoked.

authMode.description: [Required] Use 'Key' for key based authentication and 'AMLToken' for Azure Machine Learning token-based authentication. 'Key' doesn't expire but 'AMLToken' does.

keys.description:
EndpointAuthKeys to set initially on an Endpoint.
This property will always be returned as null. AuthKey values must be retrieved using the ListKeys API.

properties.description: Property dictionary. Properties can be added, but not removed or altered.

BatchRetrySettings.description: Retry settings for a batch inference operation.

maxRetries.description: Maximum retry count for a mini-batch

timeout.description: Invocation timeout for a mini-batch, in ISO 8601 format.

BindOptions.description: Describes the bind options for the container

createHostPath.description: Indicate whether to create host path.

BuildContext.description: Configuration settings for Docker build context

contextUri.description:
[Required] URI of the Docker build context used to build the image. Supports blob URIs on environment creation and may return blob or Git URIs.
<seealso href="https://docs.docker.com/engine/reference/commandline/build/#extended-description" />

dockerfilePath.description:
Path to the Dockerfile in the build context.
<seealso href="https://docs.docker.com/engine/reference/builder/" />

secretsType.description: [Required] Credential type used to authentication with storage.

enableModelExplainability.description: Flag to turn on explainability on best model.

enableOnnxCompatibleModels.description: Flag for enabling onnx compatible models.

ensembleModelDownloadTimeout.description:
During VotingEnsemble and StackEnsemble model generation, multiple fitted models from the previous child runs are downloaded.
Configure this parameter with a higher value than 300 secs, if more time is needed.

stackEnsembleSettings.description: Stack ensemble settings for stack ensemble run.

CodeConfiguration.description: Configuration for a scoring code asset.

codeId.description: ARM resource ID of the code asset.

scoringScript.description: [Required] The script to execute on startup. eg. "score.py"

tags.description: Tag dictionary. Tags can be added, removed, and updated.

isAnonymous.description: If the name version are system generated (anonymous registration).

tags.description: Tag dictionary. Tags can be added, removed, and updated.

fields.description: Fields to apply transformer logic on.

parameters.description:
Different properties to be passed to transformer.
Input expected is dictionary of key,value pairs in JSON format.

timeout.description: The max run duration in ISO 8601 format, after which the job will be cancelled. Only supports duration with precision as low as Seconds.

tags.description: Tag dictionary. Tags can be added, removed, and updated.

description.description: The description of the Machine Learning compute.

disableLocalAuth.description: Opt-out of local authentication and ensure customers can use only MSI and AAD exclusively for authentication.

resourceId.description: ARM resource id of the underlying compute

applicationSharingPolicy.description: Policy for sharing applications on this compute instance among users of parent workspace. If Personal, only the creator can access applications on this compute instance. When Shared, any workspace user can access applications on this instance depending on his/her assigned role.

computeInstanceAuthorizationType.description: The Compute Instance Authorization type. Available values are personal (default).

customServices.description: List of Custom Services added to the compute.

enableNodePublicIp.description: Enable or disable node public IP address provisioning. Possible values are: Possible values are: true - Indicates that the compute nodes will have public IPs provisioned. false - Indicates that the compute nodes will have a private endpoint and no public IPs.

personalComputeInstanceSettings.description: Settings for a personal compute instance.

schedules.description: The list of schedules to be applied on the computes.

setupScripts.description: Details of customized scripts to execute for setting up the cluster.

sshSettings.description: Specifies policy and settings for SSH access.

subnet.description: Virtual network subnet resource ID the compute nodes belong to.

ComputeInstanceSshSettings.description: Specifies policy and settings for SSH access.

adminPublicKey.description: Specifies the SSH rsa public key file as a string. Use "ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 2048" to generate your SSH key pairs.

sshPublicAccess.description: State of the public SSH port. Possible values are: Disabled - Indicates that the public ssh port is closed on this instance. Enabled - Indicates that the public ssh port is open and accessible according to the VNet/subnet policy if applicable.

ComputeSchedules.description: The list of schedules to be applied on the computes

computeStartStop.description: The list of compute start stop schedules to be applied.

status.description: Is the schedule enabled or disabled?

ContainerResourceRequirements.description: Resource requirements for each container instance within an online deployment.

cpu.description:
Number of vCPUs request/limit for container. More info:
https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/configuration/manage-compute-resources-container/

gpu.description:
Number of Nvidia GPU cards request/limit for container. More info:
https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/configuration/manage-compute-resources-container/

memory.description:
Memory size request/limit for container. More info:
https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/configuration/manage-compute-resources-container/

collectionsThroughput.description: The throughput of the collections in cosmosdb database

Cron.description: The workflow trigger cron for ComputeStartStop schedule type.

expression.description:
[Required] Specifies cron expression of schedule.
The expression should follow NCronTab format.

startTime.description: The start time in yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss format.

timeZone.description:
Specifies time zone in which the schedule runs.
TimeZone should follow Windows time zone format. Refer: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-hardware/manufacture/desktop/default-time-zones?view=windows-11

instanceCount.description: Optional number of instances or nodes used by the compute target.

instanceType.description: Optional type of VM used as supported by the compute target.

DistributionConfiguration.description: Base definition for job distribution configuration.

oneOf.description: MPI distribution configuration.

processCountPerInstance.description: Number of processes per MPI node.

oneOf.description: PyTorch distribution configuration.
TensorFlow distribution configuration.

workerCount.description: Number of workers. If not specified, will default to the instance count.

privileged.description: Indicate whether container shall run in privileged or non-privileged mode.

EarlyTerminationPolicy.description: Early termination policies enable canceling poor-performing runs before they complete

oneOf.description: Defines an early termination policy based on slack criteria, and a frequency and delay interval for evaluation

slackAmount.description: Absolute distance allowed from the best performing run.

slackFactor.description: Ratio of the allowed distance from the best performing run.

oneOf.description: Defines an early termination policy based on running averages of the primary metric of all runs
Defines an early termination policy that cancels a given percentage of runs at each evaluation interval.

truncationPercentage.description: The percentage of runs to cancel at each evaluation interval.

delayEvaluation.description: Number of intervals by which to delay the first evaluation.

evaluationInterval.description: Interval (number of runs) between policy evaluations.

identityClientId.description: For future use - The client id of the identity which will be used to access key vault.

keyIdentifier.description: Key vault uri to access the encryption key.

keyVaultArmId.description: The ArmId of the keyVault where the customer owned encryption key is present.

identity.description: The identity that will be used to access the key vault for encryption at rest.

status.description: Indicates whether or not the encryption is enabled for the workspace.

Endpoint.description: Describes the endpoint configuration for the container

hostIp.description: Host IP over which the application is exposed from the container

protocol.description: Protocol over which communication will happen over this endpoint

published.description: Port over which the application is exposed from container.

tags.description: Tag dictionary. Tags can be added, removed, and updated.

type.description: Type of the Environment Variable. Possible values are: local - For local variable

autoRebuild.description: Defines if image needs to be rebuilt based on base image changes.

build.description: Configuration settings for Docker build context.

condaFile.description:
Standard configuration file used by Conda that lets you install any kind of package, including Python, R, and C/C++ packages.
<see href="https://repo2docker.readthedocs.io/en/latest/config_files.html#environment-yml-install-a-conda-environment" />

image.description:
Name of the image that will be used for the environment.
<seealso href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/machine-learning/how-to-deploy-custom-docker-image#use-a-custom-base-image" />

isAnonymous.description: If the name version are system generated (anonymous registration).

osType.description: The OS type of the environment.

stage.description: Stage in the environment lifecycle assigned to this environment

tags.description: Tag dictionary. Tags can be added, removed, and updated.

ForecastHorizon.description: The desired maximum forecast horizon in units of time-series frequency.

oneOf.description: Forecast horizon determined automatically by system.
The desired maximum forecast horizon in units of time-series frequency.

countryOrRegionForHolidays.description:
Country or region for holidays for forecasting tasks.
These should be ISO 3166 two-letter country/region codes, for example 'US' or 'GB'.

cvStepSize.description:
Number of periods between the origin time of one CV fold and the next fold. For
example, if `CVStepSize` = 3 for daily data, the origin time for each fold will be
three days apart.

featureLags.description: Flag for generating lags for the numeric features with 'auto' or null.

forecastHorizon.description: The desired maximum forecast horizon in units of time-series frequency.

frequency.description: When forecasting, this parameter represents the period with which the forecast is desired, for example daily, weekly, yearly, etc. The forecast frequency is dataset frequency by default.

seasonality.description:
Set time series seasonality as an integer multiple of the series frequency.
If seasonality is set to 'auto', it will be inferred.

shortSeriesHandlingConfig.description: The parameter defining how if AutoML should handle short time series.

targetAggregateFunction.description:
The function to be used to aggregate the time series target column to conform to a user specified frequency.
If the TargetAggregateFunction is set i.e. not 'None', but the freq parameter is not set, the error is raised. The possible target aggregation functions are: "sum", "max", "min" and "mean".

targetLags.description: The number of past periods to lag from the target column.

targetRollingWindowSize.description: The number of past periods used to create a rolling window average of the target column.

timeColumnName.description: The name of the time column. This parameter is required when forecasting to specify the datetime column in the input data used for building the time series and inferring its frequency.

timeSeriesIdColumnNames.description:
The names of columns used to group a timeseries. It can be used to create multiple series.
If grain is not defined, the data set is assumed to be one time-series. This parameter is used with task type forecasting.

useStl.description: Configure STL Decomposition of the time-series target column.

enableModelExplainability.description: Flag to turn on explainability on best model.

enableOnnxCompatibleModels.description: Flag for enabling onnx compatible models.

ensembleModelDownloadTimeout.description:
During VotingEnsemble and StackEnsemble model generation, multiple fitted models from the previous child runs are downloaded.
Configure this parameter with a higher value than 300 secs, if more time is needed.

stackEnsembleSettings.description: Stack ensemble settings for stack ensemble run.

address.description: Public IP address of the master node of the cluster.

administratorAccount.description: Admin credentials for master node of the cluster

sshPort.description: Port open for ssh connections on the master node of the cluster.

oneOf.description: AML Token identity configuration.
Managed identity configuration.

clientId.description: Specifies a user-assigned identity by client ID. For system-assigned, do not set this field.

objectId.description: Specifies a user-assigned identity by object ID. For system-assigned, do not set this field.

resourceId.description: Specifies a user-assigned identity by ARM resource ID. For system-assigned, do not set this field.

oneOf.description: User identity configuration.

IdentityForCmk.description: Identity that will be used to access key vault for encryption at rest

userAssignedIdentity.description: The ArmId of the user assigned identity that will be used to access the customer managed key vault

type.description: Type of the image. Possible values are: docker - For docker images. azureml - For AzureML images

ImageLimitSettings.description: Limit settings for the AutoML job.

maxConcurrentTrials.description: Maximum number of concurrent AutoML iterations.

ImageModelDistributionSettingsClassifica.description:
Distribution expressions to sweep over values of model settings.
<example>
Some examples are:
```
ModelName = "choice('seresnext', 'resnest50')";
LearningRate = "uniform(0.001, 0.01)";
LayersToFreeze = "choice(0, 2)";
```</example>
For more details on how to compose distribution expressions please check the documentation:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/machine-learning/how-to-tune-hyperparameters
For more information on the available settings please visit the official documentation:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/machine-learning/how-to-auto-train-image-models.

amsGradient.description: Enable AMSGrad when optimizer is 'adam' or 'adamw'.

beta1.description: Value of 'beta1' when optimizer is 'adam' or 'adamw'. Must be a float in the range [0, 1].

beta2.description: Value of 'beta2' when optimizer is 'adam' or 'adamw'. Must be a float in the range [0, 1].

earlyStopping.description: Enable early stopping logic during training.

earlyStoppingDelay.description:
Minimum number of epochs or validation evaluations to wait before primary metric improvement
is tracked for early stopping. Must be a positive integer.

earlyStoppingPatience.description:
Minimum number of epochs or validation evaluations with no primary metric improvement before
the run is stopped. Must be a positive integer.

enableOnnxNormalization.description: Enable normalization when exporting ONNX model.

evaluationFrequency.description: Frequency to evaluate validation dataset to get metric scores. Must be a positive integer.

gradientAccumulationStep.description:
Gradient accumulation means running a configured number of "GradAccumulationStep" steps without
updating the model weights while accumulating the gradients of those steps, and then using
the accumulated gradients to compute the weight updates. Must be a positive integer.

layersToFreeze.description:
Number of layers to freeze for the model. Must be a positive integer.
For instance, passing 2 as value for 'seresnext' means
freezing layer0 and layer1. For a full list of models supported and details on layer freeze, please
see: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/machine-learning/how-to-auto-train-image-models.

learningRate.description: Initial learning rate. Must be a float in the range [0, 1].

learningRateScheduler.description: Type of learning rate scheduler. Must be 'warmup_cosine' or 'step'.

modelName.description:
Name of the model to use for training.
For more information on the available models please visit the official documentation:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/machine-learning/how-to-auto-train-image-models.

momentum.description: Value of momentum when optimizer is 'sgd'. Must be a float in the range [0, 1].

numberOfEpochs.description: Number of training epochs. Must be a positive integer.

numberOfWorkers.description: Number of data loader workers. Must be a non-negative integer.

optimizer.description: Type of optimizer. Must be either 'sgd', 'adam', or 'adamw'.

randomSeed.description: Random seed to be used when using deterministic training.

stepLRGamma.description: Value of gamma when learning rate scheduler is 'step'. Must be a float in the range [0, 1].

stepLRStepSize.description: Value of step size when learning rate scheduler is 'step'. Must be a positive integer.

trainingBatchSize.description: Training batch size. Must be a positive integer.

trainingCropSize.description: Image crop size that is input to the neural network for the training dataset. Must be a positive integer.

validationBatchSize.description: Validation batch size. Must be a positive integer.

validationCropSize.description: Image crop size that is input to the neural network for the validation dataset. Must be a positive integer.

validationResizeSize.description: Image size to which to resize before cropping for validation dataset. Must be a positive integer.

warmupCosineLRCycles.description: Value of cosine cycle when learning rate scheduler is 'warmup_cosine'. Must be a float in the range [0, 1].

warmupCosineLRWarmupEpochs.description: Value of warmup epochs when learning rate scheduler is 'warmup_cosine'. Must be a positive integer.

weightDecay.description: Value of weight decay when optimizer is 'sgd', 'adam', or 'adamw'. Must be a float in the range[0, 1].

weightedLoss.description:
Weighted loss. The accepted values are 0 for no weighted loss.
1 for weighted loss with sqrt.(class_weights). 2 for weighted loss with class_weights. Must be 0 or 1 or 2.

ImageModelDistributionSettingsObjectDete.description:
Distribution expressions to sweep over values of model settings.
<example>
Some examples are:
```
ModelName = "choice('seresnext', 'resnest50')";
LearningRate = "uniform(0.001, 0.01)";
LayersToFreeze = "choice(0, 2)";
```</example>
For more details on how to compose distribution expressions please check the documentation:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/machine-learning/how-to-tune-hyperparameters
For more information on the available settings please visit the official documentation:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/machine-learning/how-to-auto-train-image-models.

amsGradient.description: Enable AMSGrad when optimizer is 'adam' or 'adamw'.

beta1.description: Value of 'beta1' when optimizer is 'adam' or 'adamw'. Must be a float in the range [0, 1].

beta2.description: Value of 'beta2' when optimizer is 'adam' or 'adamw'. Must be a float in the range [0, 1].

boxDetectionsPerImage.description:
Maximum number of detections per image, for all classes. Must be a positive integer.
Note: This settings is not supported for the 'yolov5' algorithm.

boxScoreThreshold.description:
During inference, only return proposals with a classification score greater than
BoxScoreThreshold. Must be a float in the range[0, 1].

earlyStopping.description: Enable early stopping logic during training.

earlyStoppingDelay.description:
Minimum number of epochs or validation evaluations to wait before primary metric improvement
is tracked for early stopping. Must be a positive integer.

earlyStoppingPatience.description:
Minimum number of epochs or validation evaluations with no primary metric improvement before
the run is stopped. Must be a positive integer.

enableOnnxNormalization.description: Enable normalization when exporting ONNX model.

evaluationFrequency.description: Frequency to evaluate validation dataset to get metric scores. Must be a positive integer.

gradientAccumulationStep.description:
Gradient accumulation means running a configured number of "GradAccumulationStep" steps without
updating the model weights while accumulating the gradients of those steps, and then using
the accumulated gradients to compute the weight updates. Must be a positive integer.

imageSize.description:
Image size for train and validation. Must be a positive integer.
Note: The training run may get into CUDA OOM if the size is too big.
Note: This settings is only supported for the 'yolov5' algorithm.

layersToFreeze.description:
Number of layers to freeze for the model. Must be a positive integer.
For instance, passing 2 as value for 'seresnext' means
freezing layer0 and layer1. For a full list of models supported and details on layer freeze, please
see: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/machine-learning/how-to-auto-train-image-models.

learningRate.description: Initial learning rate. Must be a float in the range [0, 1].

learningRateScheduler.description: Type of learning rate scheduler. Must be 'warmup_cosine' or 'step'.

maxSize.description:
Maximum size of the image to be rescaled before feeding it to the backbone.
Must be a positive integer. Note: training run may get into CUDA OOM if the size is too big.
Note: This settings is not supported for the 'yolov5' algorithm.

minSize.description:
Minimum size of the image to be rescaled before feeding it to the backbone.
Must be a positive integer. Note: training run may get into CUDA OOM if the size is too big.
Note: This settings is not supported for the 'yolov5' algorithm.

modelName.description:
Name of the model to use for training.
For more information on the available models please visit the official documentation:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/machine-learning/how-to-auto-train-image-models.

modelSize.description:
Model size. Must be 'small', 'medium', 'large', or 'xlarge'.
Note: training run may get into CUDA OOM if the model size is too big.
Note: This settings is only supported for the 'yolov5' algorithm.

momentum.description: Value of momentum when optimizer is 'sgd'. Must be a float in the range [0, 1].

multiScale.description:
Enable multi-scale image by varying image size by +/- 50%.
Note: training run may get into CUDA OOM if no sufficient GPU memory.
Note: This settings is only supported for the 'yolov5' algorithm.

nmsIouThreshold.description: IOU threshold used during inference in NMS post processing. Must be float in the range [0, 1].

numberOfEpochs.description: Number of training epochs. Must be a positive integer.

numberOfWorkers.description: Number of data loader workers. Must be a non-negative integer.

optimizer.description: Type of optimizer. Must be either 'sgd', 'adam', or 'adamw'.

randomSeed.description: Random seed to be used when using deterministic training.

stepLRGamma.description: Value of gamma when learning rate scheduler is 'step'. Must be a float in the range [0, 1].

stepLRStepSize.description: Value of step size when learning rate scheduler is 'step'. Must be a positive integer.

tileGridSize.description:
The grid size to use for tiling each image. Note: TileGridSize must not be
None to enable small object detection logic. A string containing two integers in mxn format.
Note: This settings is not supported for the 'yolov5' algorithm.

tileOverlapRatio.description:
Overlap ratio between adjacent tiles in each dimension. Must be float in the range [0, 1).
Note: This settings is not supported for the 'yolov5' algorithm.

tilePredictionsNmsThreshold.description:
The IOU threshold to use to perform NMS while merging predictions from tiles and image.
Used in validation/ inference. Must be float in the range [0, 1].
Note: This settings is not supported for the 'yolov5' algorithm.
NMS: Non-maximum suppression

trainingBatchSize.description: Training batch size. Must be a positive integer.

validationBatchSize.description: Validation batch size. Must be a positive integer.

validationIouThreshold.description: IOU threshold to use when computing validation metric. Must be float in the range [0, 1].

validationMetricType.description: Metric computation method to use for validation metrics. Must be 'none', 'coco', 'voc', or 'coco_voc'.

warmupCosineLRCycles.description: Value of cosine cycle when learning rate scheduler is 'warmup_cosine'. Must be a float in the range [0, 1].

warmupCosineLRWarmupEpochs.description: Value of warmup epochs when learning rate scheduler is 'warmup_cosine'. Must be a positive integer.

weightDecay.description: Value of weight decay when optimizer is 'sgd', 'adam', or 'adamw'. Must be a float in the range[0, 1].

ImageSweepSettings.description: Model sweeping and hyperparameter sweeping related settings.

samplingAlgorithm.description: [Required] Type of the hyperparameter sampling algorithms.

livenessRoute.description: The route to check the liveness of the inference server container.

readinessRoute.description: The route to check the readiness of the inference server container.

scoringRoute.description: The port to send the scoring requests to, within the inference server container.

resources.description: Resource requests/limits for this instance type

InstanceTypeSchemaResources.description: Resource requests/limits for this instance type

limits.description: Resource limits for this instance type

requests.description: Resource requests for this instance type

oneOf.description:
AutoMLJob class.
Use this class for executing AutoML tasks like Classification/Regression etc.
See TaskType enum for all the tasks supported.

environmentId.description:
The ARM resource ID of the Environment specification for the job.
This is optional value to provide, if not provided, AutoML will default this to Production AutoML curated environment version when running the job.

environmentVariables.description: Environment variables included in the job.

outputs.description: Mapping of output data bindings used in the job.

resources.description: Compute Resource configuration for the job.

taskDetails.description: [Required] This represents scenario which can be one of Tables/NLP/Image

oneOf.description: Command job definition.

codeId.description: ARM resource ID of the code asset.

command.description: [Required] The command to execute on startup of the job. eg. "python train.py"

distribution.description: Distribution configuration of the job. If set, this should be one of Mpi, Tensorflow, PyTorch, or null.

environmentId.description: [Required] The ARM resource ID of the Environment specification for the job.

environmentVariables.description: Environment variables included in the job.

inputs.description: Mapping of input data bindings used in the job.

outputs.description: Mapping of output data bindings used in the job.

resources.description: Compute Resource configuration for the job.

oneOf.description: Pipeline Job definition: defines generic to MFE attributes.

settings.description: Pipeline settings, for things like ContinueRunOnStepFailure etc.

sourceJobId.description: ARM resource ID of source job.

oneOf.description: Sweep job definition.

earlyTermination.description: Early termination policies enable canceling poor-performing runs before they complete

inputs.description: Mapping of input data bindings used in the job.

outputs.description: Mapping of output data bindings used in the job.

searchSpace.description: [Required] A dictionary containing each parameter and its distribution. The dictionary key is the name of the parameter

componentId.description: ARM resource ID of the component resource.

computeId.description: ARM resource ID of the compute resource.

experimentName.description: The name of the experiment the job belongs to. If not set, the job is placed in the "Default" experiment.

identity.description:
Identity configuration. If set, this should be one of AmlToken, ManagedIdentity, UserIdentity or null.
Defaults to AmlToken if null.

services.description:
List of JobEndpoints.
For local jobs, a job endpoint will have an endpoint value of FileStreamObject.

tags.description: Tag dictionary. Tags can be added, removed, and updated.

oneOf.description: Literal input type.

JobOutput.description: Job output definition container information on where to find job output/logs.

dockerArgs.description: Extra arguments to pass to the Docker run command. This would override any parameters that have already been set by the system, or in this section. This parameter is only supported for Azure ML compute types.

instanceCount.description: Optional number of instances or nodes used by the compute target.

instanceType.description: Optional type of VM used as supported by the compute target.

shmSize.description: Size of the docker container's shared memory block. This should be in the format of (number)(unit) where number as to be greater than 0 and the unit can be one of b(bytes), k(kilobytes), m(megabytes), or g(gigabytes).

nodes.description:
Nodes that user would like to start the service on.
If Nodes is not set or set to null, the service will only be started on leader node.

properties.description: Additional properties to set on the endpoint.

ManagedServiceIdentity.description: Managed service identity (system assigned and/or user assigned identities)

type.description: Type of managed service identity (where both SystemAssigned and UserAssigned types are allowed).

userAssignedIdentities.description: The set of user assigned identities associated with the resource. The userAssignedIdentities dictionary keys will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}. The dictionary values can be empty objects ({}) in requests.

tags.description: Tag dictionary. Tags can be added, removed, and updated.

flavors.description: Mapping of model flavors to their properties.

isAnonymous.description: If the name version are system generated (anonymous registration).

jobName.description: Name of the training job which produced this model

modelType.description: The storage format for this entity. Used for NCD.

modelUri.description: The URI path to the model contents.

stage.description: Stage in the model lifecycle assigned to this model

tags.description: Tag dictionary. Tags can be added, removed, and updated.

oneOf.description: N-Cross validations determined automatically.
N-Cross validations are specified by user.

datasetLanguage.description: Dataset language, useful for the text data.

oneOf.description: All nodes means the service will be running on all of the nodes of the job

goal.description: [Required] Defines supported metric goals for hyperparameter tuning

primaryMetric.description: [Required] Name of the metric to optimize.

oneOf.description: Properties specific to a KubernetesOnlineDeployment.

containerResourceRequirements.description: The resource requirements for the container (cpu and memory).

oneOf.description: Properties specific to a ManagedOnlineDeployment.

appInsightsEnabled.description: If true, enables Application Insights logging.

codeConfiguration.description: Code configuration for the endpoint deployment.

egressPublicNetworkAccess.description: If Enabled, allow egress public network access. If Disabled, this will create secure egress. Default: Enabled.

environmentId.description: ARM resource ID or AssetId of the environment specification for the endpoint deployment.

environmentVariables.description: Environment variables configuration for the deployment.

livenessProbe.description: Liveness probe monitors the health of the container regularly.

model.description: The URI path to the model.

modelMountPath.description: The path to mount the model in custom container.

properties.description: Property dictionary. Properties can be added, but not removed or altered.

readinessProbe.description: Readiness probe validates if the container is ready to serve traffic. The properties and defaults are the same as liveness probe.

scaleSettings.description:
Scale settings for the deployment.
If it is null or not provided,
it defaults to TargetUtilizationScaleSettings for KubernetesOnlineDeployment
and to DefaultScaleSettings for ManagedOnlineDeployment.

authMode.description: [Required] Use 'Key' for key based authentication and 'AMLToken' for Azure Machine Learning token-based authentication. 'Key' doesn't expire but 'AMLToken' does.

compute.description:
ARM resource ID of the compute if it exists.
optional

keys.description:
EndpointAuthKeys to set initially on an Endpoint.
This property will always be returned as null. AuthKey values must be retrieved using the ListKeys API.

mirrorTraffic.description: Percentage of traffic to be mirrored to each deployment without using returned scoring. Traffic values need to sum to utmost 50.

properties.description: Property dictionary. Properties can be added, but not removed or altered.

publicNetworkAccess.description: Set to "Enabled" for endpoints that should allow public access when Private Link is enabled.

traffic.description: Percentage of traffic from endpoint to divert to each deployment. Traffic values need to sum to 100.

maxConcurrentRequestsPerInstance.description: The number of maximum concurrent requests per node allowed per deployment. Defaults to 1.

maxQueueWait.description:
The maximum amount of time a request will stay in the queue in ISO 8601 format.
Defaults to 500ms.

requestTimeout.description:
The scoring timeout in ISO 8601 format.
Defaults to 5000ms.

maxInstances.description: The maximum number of instances that the deployment can scale to. The quota will be reserved for max_instances.

minInstances.description: The minimum number of instances to always be present.

pollingInterval.description: The polling interval in ISO 8691 format. Only supports duration with precision as low as Seconds.

targetUtilizationPercentage.description: Target CPU usage for the autoscaler.

PersonalComputeInstanceSettings.description: Settings for a personal compute instance.

assignedUser.description: A user explicitly assigned to a personal compute instance.

privateEndpoint.description: The resource of private end point.

privateLinkServiceConnectionState.description: A collection of information about the state of the connection between service consumer and provider.

PrivateEndpointResource.description: The PE network resource that is linked to this PE connection.

subnetArmId.description: The subnetId that the private endpoint is connected to.

PrivateLinkServiceConnectionState.description: A collection of information about the state of the connection between service consumer and provider.

actionsRequired.description: A message indicating if changes on the service provider require any updates on the consumer.

description.description: The reason for approval/rejection of the connection.

status.description: Indicates whether the connection has been Approved/Rejected/Removed by the owner of the service.

failureThreshold.description: The number of failures to allow before returning an unhealthy status.

initialDelay.description: The delay before the first probe in ISO 8601 format.

period.description: The length of time between probes in ISO 8601 format.

successThreshold.description: The number of successful probes before returning a healthy status.

timeout.description: The probe timeout in ISO 8601 format.

Recurrence.description: The workflow trigger recurrence for ComputeStartStop schedule type.

interval.description: [Required] Specifies schedule interval in conjunction with frequency

startTime.description: The start time in yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss format.

timeZone.description:
Specifies time zone in which the schedule runs.
TimeZone should follow Windows time zone format. Refer: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-hardware/manufacture/desktop/default-time-zones?view=windows-11

hours.description: [Required] List of hours for the schedule.

minutes.description: [Required] List of minutes for the schedule.

monthDays.description: List of month days for the schedule

weekDays.description: List of days for the schedule.

id.description:
This is the private endpoint connection name created on SRP
Full resource id: /subscriptions/{subId}/resourceGroups/{rgName}/providers/Microsoft.MachineLearningServices/{resourceType}/{resourceName}/privateEndpointConnections/{peConnectionName}

properties.description: Properties of the Private Endpoint Connection

RegistryPrivateEndpointConnectionPropert.description: Properties of the Private Endpoint Connection

privateEndpoint.description: The PE network resource that is linked to this PE connection.

provisioningState.description: One of null, "Succeeded", "Provisioning", "Failed". While not approved, it's null.

actionsRequired.description: Some RP chose "None". Other RPs use this for region expansion.

description.description: User-defined message that, per NRP doc, may be used for approval-related message.

status.description: Connection status of the service consumer with the service provider

managedResourceGroup.description: ResourceId of the managed RG if the registry has system created resources

mlFlowRegistryUri.description: MLFlow Registry URI for the Registry

privateEndpointConnections.description: Private endpoint connections info used for pending connections in private link portal

publicNetworkAccess.description:
Is the Registry accessible from the internet?
Possible values: "Enabled" or "Disabled"

regionDetails.description: Details of each region the registry is in

RegistryRegionArmDetails.description: Details for each region the registry is in

location.description: The location where the registry exists

enableModelExplainability.description: Flag to turn on explainability on best model.

enableOnnxCompatibleModels.description: Flag for enabling onnx compatible models.

ensembleModelDownloadTimeout.description:
During VotingEnsemble and StackEnsemble model generation, multiple fitted models from the previous child runs are downloaded.
Configure this parameter with a higher value than 300 secs, if more time is needed.

stackEnsembleSettings.description: Stack ensemble settings for stack ensemble run.

ResourceId.description: Represents a resource ID. For example, for a subnet, it is the resource URL for the subnet.

SamplingAlgorithm.description:
The Sampling Algorithm used to generate hyperparameter values, along with properties to
configure the algorithm

oneOf.description: Defines a Sampling Algorithm that generates values based on previous values
Defines a Sampling Algorithm that exhaustively generates every value combination in the space
Defines a Sampling Algorithm that generates values randomly

rule.description: The specific type of random algorithm

seed.description: An optional integer to use as the seed for random number generation

secretsType.description: [Required] Credential type used to authentication with storage.

maxNodeCount.description: Max number of nodes to use

minNodeCount.description: Min number of nodes to use

nodeIdleTimeBeforeScaleDown.description: Node Idle Time before scaling down amlCompute. This string needs to be in the RFC Format.

endpointInvocationDefinition.description:
[Required] Defines Schedule action definition details.
<see href="TBD" />

id.description: A system assigned id for the schedule.

provisioningStatus.description: The current deployment state of schedule.

status.description: Is the schedule enabled or disabled?

action.description: [Required] Specifies the action of the schedule

tags.description: Tag dictionary. Tags can be added, removed, and updated.

scriptArguments.description: Optional command line arguments passed to the script to run.

scriptData.description: The location of scripts in the mounted volume.

scriptSource.description: The storage source of the script: workspace.

timeout.description: Optional time period passed to timeout command.

creationScript.description: Script that's run only once during provision of the compute.

startupScript.description: Script that's run every time the machine starts.

cosmosDb.description: The settings for the service managed cosmosdb account.

secretsType.description: [Required] Credential type used to authentication with storage.

SetupScripts.description: Details of customized scripts to execute for setting up the cluster.

name.description: Unique name of the private link.

SharedPrivateLinkResourceProperty.description: Properties of a shared private link resource.

groupId.description: The private link resource group id.

privateLinkResourceId.description: The resource id that private link links to.

status.description: Indicates whether the connection has been Approved/Rejected/Removed by the owner of the service.

Sku.description: The resource model definition representing SKU

capacity.description: If the SKU supports scale out/in then the capacity integer should be included. If scale out/in is not possible for the resource this may be omitted.

family.description: If the service has different generations of hardware, for the same SKU, then that can be captured here.

name.description: The name of the SKU. Ex - P3. It is typically a letter+number code

size.description: The SKU size. When the name field is the combination of tier and some other value, this would be the standalone code.

tier.description: This field is required to be implemented by the Resource Provider if the service has more than one tier, but is not required on a PUT.

leafDomainLabel.description: Leaf domain label of public endpoint

overwriteExistingDomain.description: Indicates whether to overwrite existing domain label.

status.description: Enable or disable ssl for scoring

StackEnsembleSettings.description: Advances setting to customize StackEnsemble run.

stackMetaLearnerKWargs.description: Optional parameters to pass to the initializer of the meta-learner.

stackMetaLearnerTrainPercentage.description: Specifies the proportion of the training set (when choosing train and validation type of training) to be reserved for training the meta-learner. Default value is 0.2.

stackMetaLearnerType.description: The meta-learner is a model trained on the output of the individual heterogeneous models.

StorageAccountDetails.description: Details of storage account to be used for the Registry

systemCreatedStorageAccount.description: Details of system created storage account to be used for the registry

userCreatedStorageAccount.description: Details of user created storage account to be used for the registry

timeout.description: The max run duration in ISO 8601 format, after which the job will be cancelled. Only supports duration with precision as low as Seconds.

nodeCount.description: The number of compute nodes currently assigned to the compute.

resourceGroup.description: Name of the resource group in which workspace is located.

workspaceName.description: Name of Azure Machine Learning workspace.

armResourceId.description: This is populated once the ACR account is created.
This is populated once the storage account is created.

blockedTransformers.description: These transformers shall not be used in featurization.

columnNameAndTypes.description: Dictionary of column name and its type (int, float, string, datetime etc).

datasetLanguage.description: Dataset language, useful for the text data.

enableDnnFeaturization.description: Determines whether to use Dnn based featurizers for data featurization.

mode.description:
Featurization mode - User can keep the default 'Auto' mode and AutoML will take care of necessary transformation of the data in featurization phase.
If 'Off' is selected then no featurization is done.
If 'Custom' is selected then user can specify additional inputs to customize how featurization is done.

transformerParams.description: User can specify additional transformers to be used along with the columns to which it would be applied and parameters for the transformer constructor.

enableEarlyTermination.description: Enable early termination, determines whether or not if AutoMLJob will terminate early if there is no score improvement in last 20 iterations.

exitScore.description: Exit score for the AutoML job.

TargetLags.description: The number of past periods to lag from the target column.

oneOf.description: Target lags rolling window determined automatically.

TmpfsOptions.description: Describes the tmpfs options for the container

codeId.description: ARM resource ID of the code asset.

command.description: [Required] The command to execute on startup of the job. eg. "python train.py"

distribution.description: Distribution configuration of the job. If set, this should be one of Mpi, Tensorflow, PyTorch, or null.

environmentId.description: [Required] The ARM resource ID of the Environment specification for the job.

environmentVariables.description: Environment variables included in the job.

resources.description: Compute Resource configuration for the job.

expression.description:
[Required] Specifies cron expression of schedule.
The expression should follow NCronTab format.

interval.description: [Required] Specifies schedule interval in conjunction with frequency

endTime.description:
Specifies end time of schedule in ISO 8601, but without a UTC offset. Refer https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601.
Recommented format would be "2022-06-01T00:00:01"
If not present, the schedule will run indefinitely

startTime.description: Specifies start time of schedule in ISO 8601 format, but without a UTC offset.

timeZone.description:
Specifies time zone in which the schedule runs.
TimeZone should follow Windows time zone format. Refer: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-hardware/manufacture/desktop/default-time-zones?view=windows-11

UserAccountCredentials.description: Settings for user account that gets created on each on the nodes of a compute.

adminUserName.description: Name of the administrator user account which can be used to SSH to nodes.

adminUserPassword.description: Password of the administrator user account.

adminUserSshPublicKey.description: SSH public key of the administrator user account.

VirtualMachineImage.description: Virtual Machine image for Windows AML Compute

address.description: Public IP address of the virtual machine.

isNotebookInstanceCompute.description: Indicates whether this compute will be used for running notebooks.

notebookServerPort.description: Notebook server port open for ssh connections.

VolumeDefinition.description: Describes the volume configuration for the container

readOnly.description: Indicate whether to mount volume as readOnly. Default value for this is false.

source.description: Source of the mount. For bind mounts this is the host path.

target.description: Target of the mount. For bind mounts this is the path in the container.

type.description: Type of Volume Definition. Possible Values: bind,volume,tmpfs,npipe

VolumeOptions.description: Describes the volume options for the container

value.description: Value details of the workspace connection.

valueFormat.description: format for the workspace connection value

WorkspaceProperties.description: The properties of a machine learning workspace.

allowPublicAccessWhenBehindVnet.description: The flag to indicate whether to allow public access when behind VNet.

applicationInsights.description: ARM id of the application insights associated with this workspace.

containerRegistry.description: ARM id of the container registry associated with this workspace.

discoveryUrl.description: Url for the discovery service to identify regional endpoints for machine learning experimentation services

encryption.description: The encryption settings of Azure ML workspace.

friendlyName.description: The friendly name for this workspace. This name in mutable

hbiWorkspace.description: The flag to signal HBI data in the workspace and reduce diagnostic data collected by the service

imageBuildCompute.description: The compute name for image build

keyVault.description: ARM id of the key vault associated with this workspace. This cannot be changed once the workspace has been created

primaryUserAssignedIdentity.description: The user assigned identity resource id that represents the workspace identity.

publicNetworkAccess.description: Whether requests from Public Network are allowed.

sharedPrivateLinkResources.description: The list of shared private link resources in this workspace.

storageAccount.description: ARM id of the storage account associated with this workspace. This cannot be changed once the workspace has been created

v1LegacyMode.description: Enabling v1_legacy_mode may prevent you from using features provided by the v2 API.

identity.description: Managed service identity (system assigned and/or user assigned identities)

kind.description: Metadata used by portal/tooling/etc to render different UX experiences for resources of the same type.

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

name.description: Name for the Batch inference endpoint.

sku.description: Sku details required for ARM contract for Autoscaling.

tags.description: Resource tags.
